overview: Power, corruption... and thighs. Welcome to the high-stress, hard-sell world of advertising! Things are tough, even for the biggest agency in town. It's time to trim the fat. So what's the best incentive for fat cat executives to keep their jobs? Sex, of course - and lots of it! Anal, DP's, girl-girl, and even a nasty little three-way that's sure to impress the boss! Get ready to go... Over the Top. There's nothing like it!
tagline: How To Get Ahead In Advertising
title: Over The Top
